task_descriptions:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: `FullName@bank`
- Your bank account: `AccountNumber@bank`, with PIN `PIN@bank`
- Today is `Day@schedule` the `Date@plane` of June, `Time@restaurant`

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Checking bank balance
- Reserving a table at a restaurant (e.g. `Name-1@restaurant` or `Name-2@restaurant`) for today
- Checking the weather forecast in different Cities (e.g. `City-1@weather` or `City-2@weather`)
linear_guide: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'Reserving a table at a restaurant' and 'Bank balance checking' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also ask the assistant about the weather.
Please have some smalltalk with the AI Assistant at some point in this dialogue.
If you haven't yet, it's time to change topic. You can also go back and forth between topics.
If it makes sense, use some negations ('I don't want X', or 'anything but Y', etc.)
Keep going until you've covered all the topics (reserving a table at a restaurant and bank balance checking). The conversation should continue at least until the last instruction is given.
Ok, once you've touched on all the topics (restaurant and bank balance checking) and engaged in some smalltalk, you can bring the conversation to a natural close.
